content.raw:
I might be missing something but how does a “new user” find out the path to a specific file inside a package? I can see there is a “copy sdf tag” in the website but I couldn’t find an obvious way to fetch the URL of a subobject, since right click \+ copy link address on the file download link doesn’t work.

Also if I had to guess the path I would have guessed \[…\]/models/actor/meshes/talk\_a.dae, so can we make it easier for users to embed meshes with any combination of the following?

1. Simplifying the path
2. Adding a way to get the any file url on the website
3. Document the subfolder in which paths are stored \(\[model\_uri\]/tip/files\)

I’m guessing n.2 would be the best since the subfolder doesn’t seem to be fixed \(there is no /tip in the Radio mesh?\)
